Text:
Waouuuh ! "ethnic cleansing" "apartheid" "demon" !
I wonder what could be your opinion about El Assad ??
It's always funny to see a nazi who loves  palestinians and share this kind of shit.
You deserve the Golden Palm of Propaganda for all your posts :

- Jenin Jenin
- Harvest of Despair: The Unkown Holocaust 
- SUGiHARA ☮ Conspiracy of Kindness
- GODS OF ENTERTAiNMENT ( HaHa ! even Spielberg is guilty !!)
- Hitler in Colour
- Fire Storm Over Dresden
- Hitler's Canadians
- Russia's Last Tsar
- America Rebuilds
- The Other Israel: The Whole Zionist      Conspiracy

It's a pity for palestinians to have a friend like you !

to "moonfleet"

You obviously don't know what a war-name is, such as those of the genocidal Bolsheviks, who infiltrated Russia from the west; and yes, they were chamelions, demons of sort.

You are among the endless throng of unappreciative, whining, non-contributing, thankless losers, who don't know much at all, and would rather complain, and throw insults like "nazi", than care about the martyrs that your kin killed. By your naming of Assad, as el-Assad, I assume that you are a Sunni Muslim, probably Egyptian, who supports the terrorists that are currently attacking Syria. Shame on you, hypocrite! Shame on you, terrorist!

For your information, I am not a "nazi", and the reason I am posting videos, is to share the truth that is little-known, because the top-down propaganda-machine tells us nothing but lies.

What you don't realize, is that none of the videos I shared, are actually "pro-Hitler", but you don't care, and you didn't watch any of them, because you would rather be a fool, than have an open mind.

Firestorm over Dresden is pro-German, their side of the story, not "nazi", you slimeball.

Harvest of Despair is pro-Ukrainian, their side of the story; anti-Bolshevik, and anti-Stalin.

Jenin Jenin is pro-Palestinian, their side of the story; anti-zionist israel, who are thugs and terrorists, liars of extraordinary cowardice.

Russia's Last Tsar tells the story of Nicholas, and his family, how they were murdered by the Bolsheviks, who attacked Christians, because they were atheists with Jewish anti-Christian upbringings, and views.

America Rebuilds is about 9/11, and is pro-American, because it exposes Larry Silverstein, who admits right on camera, that he and his cohorts demolished WTC 7.

Hitler's Canadians tells the story about German POWs who were sent to Canada, about their lives in the Canadian camps, a good story.

The Other Israel is an Evangelical Christian, biblical movie about the ancient pharisees, their history; and is quite factual, regardless of the throngs of idiots who think there can actually be something real, called "Judeo-Christian", which is actually an alliance of war-mongering liars, who both respectively, want to build a temple, and synagogue, smack on top of the Dome of the Rock.

Gods of Entertainment is about the American media empire, which controls 95% of all media, TV, movies, music, video games, with but five mega-corporations -- and it's penchant for satanic propaganda, which is far less profitable than the good.

Sugihara is the name of a heroic Japanese diplomat, who saved more than 2000 Jews from being persecuted, not by Germans, as they were afraid of, but in reality by Lithuanians.

God help us, because so many are willfully ignorant, and complete hypocrites who support war, whilst claiming to be righteous. Save all your pity for yourself.

The DVD *is* being seeded, despite what the counter says.

To all good people who seed the DVDs they like, thank you very much!

@ Dickinyourmoutnazirat

You are a lying rat. The only reason you upload these movies are to post your disgusting revisionist lies. The movies is not the issue. 

I agree with moonfleet - it is a pity rats like you exist. A nazi or a palestinian cocksucker? Who cares. We all know you are lost in your own mental crap. A worthless nobody living in misery.

Dear filesharers! 
Dont support this moron and his hatefull mind. Ignore him and his propaganda. Trash your DL.

to "moonfleet"

I counted no less than 9 insults and lies from you, in the previous post alone. Who is really the nobody, living in misery? Who is the one demanding censorship? Who has not even bothered to watch one movie, but takes it upon himself to keep coming back? You are everything you called me, except for a Palestinian.
My previous comment was actually for the serial spammer, "mac the ripper". I will no longer respond to your insults and lies.
